\begin{equation}
\label{F3}
  F^{(3)} = \frac2{L^2} (\sigma^1-L A^1) \wedge
  (\sigma^2-L A^2) \wedge (\sigma^3-L A^3) 
  - \frac1{L} \sum\limits_{a=1}^3 F^a \wedge  
  (\sigma^a-L A^a)~.
\
